xxl.applications.xml
Class Common

java.lang.Object
  xxl.applications.xml.Common

public class Common
extends Object

Class that contains common functionality for the XML examples.

Method Detail

getXMLOutPath

public static String getXMLOutPath()
Constructs the output directory and returns the path. The returned path contains a file separator at the end.

Returns:
String - the XMLOutPath

getXMLDataPath

public static String getXMLDataPath()
Returns the XMLDataPath. The returned path contains a file separator at the end.

Returns:
String - the XMLDataPath

getRelationalDataPath

public static String getRelationalDataPath()
Returns the relational data path. The returned path contains a file separator at the end.

Returns:
String - the relational data path

getSource

public static MetaDataCursor getSource(int nr)
Returns a special XML-Source as MetaDataCursor. Not all of the sources are available with standard XXL packaging.

Parameters:
nr - Number of the source (0 to 6).
Returns:
The source as MetaDataCursor.

output

public static void output(MetaDataCursor cursor)
Outputs the specified cursor to System.out.

Parameters:
cursor - The cursor which is gone through.

outputMetaData

public static void outputMetaData(MetaDataCursor cursor)
Outputs the meta data of the specified cursor to System.out.

Parameters:
cursor - The cursor of which the meta data is taken.

getSampleTree

public static Node getSampleTree()
Returns a small sample XML-tree in internal representation.

Returns:
Node - the tree.

writeTree

public static void writeTree(Node root,
                             String filename,
                             SizeConverter converter)
                      throws IOException
Writes the tree to a File.

Parameters:
root - The tree to be stored.
filename - Name of the file to which the tree is written.
converter - Converter which can serialize the tree.
Throws:
IOException

readTree

public static Node readTree(String filename,
                            SizeConverter converter)
                     throws IOException
Reads the tree from a File.

Parameters:
filename - Name of the file with a tree inside.
converter - Converter which can deserialize the tree.
Returns:
The root of the tree which was read.
Throws:
IOException
